Certified classic. Total OG game. Gameplay, graphics, art style and direction, music, vibes, and main character. All great!

By the way, don't alt+F4 to quit, the game will freeze. Also, if the game crashes right after the tutorial/prologue, make sure you disable PhysX or w.e in the settings. | It's one of the greatest classic games ever, yet it remains one of the most innovative. Not to mention its sleek and polished design, along with its captivating parkour action and thrilling gameplay, which make it truly one of a kind. | [h2] Pros [/h2]

1. First things first, kudos to the devs for making a non-sexualised female mc back in the day against the norms (even if it was today, we all know a large portion of "Gamers" would lose their mind screaming DEI and woke lol). 

2. Secondly, the art direction is superb and it shows that stylistic approach stands the test of time better than realism (look at any REALISTIC graphics game from back then that people lost their shit over, now they just look ugly af). 

3. The parkour is unique, feels great to play on controller, and is easy to learn but hard to master. When you pull off some cool wallrun-turn-jump-walllrun combo, you'd feel like a total badass.

4. The voice actors have done a terrific job giving personality to the characters. I really enjoys Merc's voice guiding me through the levels, and the others were NOT far worse too.

[h2] Cons [/h2]

1. The story is dogshit. It works well enough to connect one parkouring stage to another, but don't go in expecting any story that might emotionally involve you lol.

2. The combat sections feel unnecessary and underdeveloped. Maybe it's just my problem, but I felt like the game would've been better if they scraped the combat totally and added a few more parkouring challenged instead.

[h2] Some points to note [/h2]

1. The game is short. I died a lot of times, stayed afk during game time watching game of thrones (lol) and yet i completed the game under 6 and a 1/2 hours. It might be a deal breaker for some, but I think this was well worth the money.

2. When you play, turn OFF the PhysX, or the game would suffer severe framerate drop everytime a glass shatters (any combat section, really).

[h2] Conclusion [/h2]

Albeit short and emotionally not gripping, Mirror's edge boasts fun and unique gameplay with great visuals to date and a pure good fun time. I recommend this. 

[h1] Score; 6/10; Needs more Edging  [/h1]

Game Name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II - Anniversary Edition
Reviews:
At first I didn't like the gameplay being a StarCraft verteran.But I warmed up to it .The atmosphere is where it's at as this game seems to capture the essence of 40K.I would recommend this game to anyone who likes squad based hero type RTS games with no focus on base building or resource management. | I play the singleplayer campaign at least once a year. Together with the mod Ultimate Exterminatus, which I highly recommend, the campaign becomes a great experience (on top of what it already was) with great replayability. | Dawn of War 2 jest grą strategiczną rozgrywaną w czasie rzeczywistym w jednym z najpopularniejszych uniwersów przyszłości – gotyckim świecie Warhammera 40000, w którym krwawą walkę toczą między sobą przedstawiciele kilkunastu armii.

Tym razem w trybie single player gracz może poprowadzić do boju oddziały świetnie wyszkolonych Space Marines.

W odróżnieniu od poprzedniej części mamy zdecydowanie większy wpływ na kolejność zajmowanych terytoriów.

Nasze oddziały przed każdą bitwą znajdują się bowiem na statku kosmicznym orbitującym wokół planety, o którą toczy się walka.

Każda misja zwieńczona jest potyczką z tzw. bossem, czyli przeciwnikiem, który jest bardziej odporny na obrażenia i dysponuje potężniejszymi atakami niż większość wrogów.

Wraz z postępami w grze, wzrasta poziom doświadczenia Kosmicznych Marines, dzięki czemu z zadania na zadanie coraz lepiej radzą sobie w boju.

W Dawn of War 2 dowodzimy oddziałami najczęściej składającymi się tylko z kilku żołnierzy, wobec czego autorzy chcąc, aby gracz łatwiej się z nimi identyfikował postanowili je spersonalizować.

Tak więc każdy z nich posiada własną nazwę oraz lidera wymienionego nie tylko z pełnionej funkcji, ale także z imienia i nazwiska. | Great game. One of the WH40k and general best ones. Alows you to make your own pace and tactics. Easy to lern mechanics and lot of options for fine tuning your squads. | New warhammer fan since space marine 2 so this is part of of my crusade into the content and lore with the games (and books and models and painting). And yeah  this is a great warhammer game.  The ambiance is there, the faction, the action, the quotes. Epic Warhammer 40 k! (and I 'm no heritic to say otherwise)

Game Name: Warhammer® 40,000: Dawn of War® II Chaos Rising
Reviews:
The first expansion to Dawn of War II which added one new faction to the roster in the form of chaos and a new story campaign on the Aurelia sector.
On that note, I have mixed feelings about the new campaign. The difficulty curve is rather steep and the new corruption mechanic is kind of pointless because you have to pretty much skip content in order to gain corruption. Either that or purposely equip increasingly cursed items like an idiot.
On the flip side I like the new psyker unit and the new weapons are welcome additions. I even went out of my way to rotate characters around to try the new gear.
Besides that the game is rather janky these days, especially the sound, so I encountered more technical problems that I care to mention. The highlight of the issues was probably bosses pushing Cyrus outside of the level geometry.
Anyway, that's all I have to say since this is an expansion and not a new game. I'm not the biggest fan of this one and I think it's unlikely to change anyone's opinion if they didn't like the base game but I think you literally can't purchase Dawn of War II without all of the expansions anymore so you'll get it regardless. | Отлизанные мужики в силовой броне, пиз****я с другими мужиками в силовой броне с шипами, происходит лютое гачимучи под мега эпичные треки. Кровь, кишки, матюки,голые сиськи, все что нужно. Эреб п*др))) | 战锤系列··体验这款屡获殊荣的实时战略游戏所有精彩内容··在这个落后又先进的时代，‘‘你’’指挥官将带领星际战士和无畏机甲一步步打垮敌人！保卫帝国！为帝皇赢得最后胜利吧！ | Great Warhammer 40k game for playing as Blood Ravens.

R.I.P. Steam listing though.  Ultimately K.O.'d by the unstoppable compatibility monster... |   Cool missions. You have to use tactics.

Game Name: Warhammer 40,000: Dawn of War II: Retribution
Reviews:
完结封档。
据说开发商濒临倒闭所以只做了一个战役流程适配所有种族。不过战役本身还是挺有意思的，体验了灭绝令，打过大不净者再打恐虐大魔。背景音乐也很有力。 | 开场不能碰键盘，随便按一个键就会报错退出。中文翻译及其敷衍，而且很多根本没中文，还是英语。 | gra takie 6/10 średniak z pozytywnymi elementami trochę scam bo niby mam 6 czy 7 kampanii różnych frakcji ale w rzeczywistości  te same mapy te same misje czyli wystarczy ograć kampanie jedną frakcją i macie całość zaliczoną nie ma sensu ogrywać gry ponownie inną frakcją po ukończeniu kampanie. | 战锤系列··体验这款屡获殊荣的实时战略游戏所有精彩内容··在这个落后又先进的时代，‘‘你’’指挥官将带领星际战士和无畏机甲一步步打垮敌人！保卫帝国！为帝皇赢得最后胜利吧！ | The final expansion to Dawn of War II adding yet another faction to the roster in the shape of the Imperium of Man.
Out of all the game this one caused me the least technical issues and it's also the most complete in terms of content so Retribution is the best for playing skirmishes.
Besides that the campaign makes a return with a new party of heroes, this time based off the commander units from the skirmish mode, and the conclusion to the story that started in the first Dawn of War with some pretty cool cutscenes. 
But I saved the best for last: the campaign can be played with all 6 races. They vary in quality but they are all rich on hammy voice acting.
The only issue is that the campaign is always the same with slightly different dialogue. Some elements from skirmish mode are present such as building units but the levels are fairly linear so there's little space for the dynamic battles from actual skirmishes. Also, one of your heroes is always silent and that blows.
In conclusion, I think Retribution is pretty good. It's sad that it never reached the level of polish that Company of Heroes has but Warhammer is obviously more niche than World War 2 so that's understandable.

I decided to play this first-person beat 'em up again with my brother, [i]years[/i] after having experienced it via Xbox Live.  And it's a great experience still, holding up far better for me than the likes of [i]Braid[/i] and [i]Limbo[/i].  That's strange, since 2D was and is easier to make [i]immediately[/i] playable on a smaller dev budget.  Now, there [i]is[/i] a little jank in this, as you would expect to find in a [b]3D indie game[/b] made before there was even a real 2D indie boom -- but not nearly as much as I feared.  The wild [b]bio-punk[/b] style comes through as strong as ever without RTX/SSAO/8K textures/DLSS and whatever all the rest of the game-delaying, budget-bloating nonsense is -- and I found myself getting sucked right back in to the wacky world of Zenozoik after knocking about an even jankier and much less interesting reality for a decade-plus.

Such jank as you might experience is all baked into the game engine, primarily in the slight sense of [i]delay[/i] and the queuing you get with the melee inputs.  Ghat's main fisty combo, for instance, is set off by [b]holding[/b] the button down until it is complete, with the other button for hard attacks.  It's polished enough that you can definitely [i]get good[/i] at it, but sometimes the delay will make you feel like a madman flailing with rage when you're in the thick of a big battle.  It kind of works in a [i]thematic[/i] sense, really, when you consider the savage world you're in.  Some people complain about the gun combat too, but I think it works well enough; Ghat and his big extended family mostly fight with feet and fists, and since these biopunk guns, all made of bone, stone, and sinew, take work to reload and aim, [i]of course[/i] they might feel a trifle more awkward than those in a legit FPS.  I know it sounds like trying to wallpaper flaws with an imagined [b]meta-connection[/b] between story and gameplay, but it's seriously fine and feels good when you're actually playing and soaking up all the vibes.

Back in the 2009 of its original release, a lot of people played this because there weren't a lot of options -- it just so happened to be a very good, very memorable game despite the widespread attention it incidentally received.  Nowadays, it will appeal more to the PC indie crowd I think.  It's short, engrossing, and costs as much as a sachet of corn nuts when it's on sale, so why not throw it on the ol' wishlist? | Un clasico, quizas hoy no impresione mucho, pero en el contexto de este juego es super innovador, creativo y original. Disfruté jugarlo y seguir su historia. Espero con ganas jugar la segunda parte y el Artifacts of Chaos. | Incredible visual and sound design. Amateur voice acting but it gets better in the sequels. Never thought I would see a Source engine fighting game. Go buy this for a surreal experience. | The gameplay largely consists of first person brawls that are just fun to play through. The setting and story and characters are all very, very weird, so if you enjoy the bizarre or like unique settings then you absolutely should play this at least once. | -геймдизайн. душный битэмап от первого лица, с сомнительными управлением и боевкой в унылых локациях.
~сюжет. грибоедовое.
~графика. староватое, но стилистика норм.

Braid é um excelente jogo pra quem busca jogo puzzle-platform que seja bem feitinho, porque de fato, o jogo é bem feitinho.

O jogo tem altos aspectos positivos como por exemplo a arte visual, é simples e bem bonitinho, as músicas também são muito boazinhas de ouvir (mesmo depois de um bom tempo) e também, não é apenas puzzle, tem também uma historinha.
O jogo tem uma pegada muito igual a de Super Mario, desde alguns inimigos ou até mesmo o fato de você estar atrás de uma princesa e sempre quando você chega no castelo, ela não está lá.

A principal diferença de Braid nisso tudo é que você pode voltar no tempo. E isso abriu portas pra diversas mecânicas, seja apenas voltar no tempo pra impedir alguma morte, manipular determinados itens ou inimigos que não são afetados pelo tempo diferente de outros, criar clones de si mesmo que recriam todos os passos que você fez ou até mesmo criar campos de força que quanto mais próximo deles, mais devagar o tempo passa. Sério, todas essas mecânicas são muito legais na hora dos puzzles. 

Só que o jogo tem muitos pontos negativos também.

Alguns puzzles são MUITO dificeis, no nível de você se estressar MUITO. O jogo não deixa de nenhuma forma explícito como você deve resolver alguns puzzles, e muitos deles tem uma forma única de resolver e as vezes tão específica mas tão específica que chega a ser ridículo como um ser humano conseguiria pensar em resolver daquela forma. 
A história também é muito fraca e confusa, não faz o menor sentido e é uma leitura muito difícil. Outra coisa é que em vez de contarem aos poucos ao passar de cada fase, o jogo te apresenta um sistema de mundos aonde cada mundo tem um "lobby" e lá você pode ler toda a história de uma vez sem animação nenhuma. 
E também, a história não tem nada a ver com os puzzles ou as fases que você está jogando, é como se fossem duas coisas completamente diferentes, história e jogo.

No quesito história dos jogos, por ser um dos primeiros jogos indies mais relevantes ou no quesito puzzle-platform, que é definitivamente um dos mais diferentes que tem, é um jogo muito bom. Pra alguém que não é fã de jogos assim, mas decidiu dar uma chance porque tem muita gente que elogia, é um jogo muito chatinho. 7/10. | 毫无疑问的顶尖设计，游戏内的一切都围绕时间回溯的主题展开，尾声醍醐灌顶。
但是真的好累，玩得好累啊，感觉从来没有这么累过。
游戏里不断地回溯，不断地回溯，回到现实世界的时间认知好像都要被扭曲了。
不追求全收集了，那应该不是给人类完成的。 | 이 스피드런 이라는 도전과제는 나를 14년동안 괴롭혀왔음.. 업적 단 하나 남은 상태라
업적올클!!!!!!!! 하고 생각날쯤 다시 했다가 접다가 반복한 어느 날..

게임할때 서브모니터로 항상 유튜브 보면서 게임하다 
문득 이 게임이 떠올라 바로 서브 모니터에 해당 도전과제 클리어한 유튜브 영상 띄워두고 
그대로 따라해서 클리어함... 

하지만 따라한들 특정 스테이지.. 
대표적으로 뒤로 돌아가면 시간도 돌아가는 구간, 반지구간에서
타이밍 한번 꼬이면 시간 엄청 지체되기때문에 리트해야함 주의 

본인도 도전과제 하기전 메인완주 후 스테이지 파악 기강잡고 
스피드런 챌린지 6번가량 트라이 후 클리어함

Plants vs. Zombies brings to mind the brilliant designers of the classic arcade games of the early 80's. Designers who, with access to scarily primitive hardware, scant complex controls, and often the singular player-controlled verb of "move," created iconic, immortal and wonderfully fun video games. Plants vs. Zombies is a game played with the mouse, and there are no exceptions made to this premise. There are no hotkeys, or alternate control schemes. It is a game your grandma could play, and I bet she'd like it. Also just like those old arcade games, Plants vs. Zombies, in its genius birthed of simplicity, comes to mind rapidly when considering what games are prime examples of art. Rest in Peace PopCap. | [h1]El juego de las plantas[/h1]
-uf sin comentarios, pvz es eterno
-arte: standar para una época
-jugabilidad: revoluciono el gaming
-música: tiene una girasol.... que canta
-dificultad: infantes con iphone en el bolsillo :v
-precio: vale cada centavo, aunque esta version de steam deja mucho que desear XD, malditasea steam! | 这里的游戏时长只有不到一个小时，但是它的具体时长我也无法得知，或许几百小时，又或许是上千小时，不论多少小时，也不论是否支持中文，都挡不住我为同年补票的心！ | 拥有超高英语水平，让我不需要汉化也能理解游戏内容，手放在鼠标上感觉像回到家一样自在，操作更是一气呵成，虽然有这么高的天赋但还是不考虑打职业 | this game was my childhood its hard fun cool and great animations one of my favs is the coffee bean animation i love to get the achievements but some of them like the yeti one or the grow 100 feet of the wisdom tree are just really one that was annoying was NO FUNGUS AMONG US that was hard but fun i really recomend this game.

É um jogo curto e bem caprichado! Você tem que passar por plataformas e diversos "quebra-cabeças" controlando três personagens, um guerreiro, mago e a arqueira (cada qual tem sua habilidade). Me lembrei muito quando fechei o primeiro jogo "Unravel". Ambos os games possuem seus graus de dificuldade, aqui você anda num ambiente encantado, cheio de cores e luzes. O que me encantou é a qualidade gráfica do jogo, a jogabilidade tranquila também. 

Valeu a pena cada centavo gasto nele. O JOGO É TOP! <3 | Trine - первая игра в серии с одноименным названием. Жанр игры называется 2.5д, потому что все объекты в приницпе 3д, но при этом угол обзора дается только через бок, но это не мешает игре быть веселой и занимательной. Каждая игра выходит в промежуток в 4 года, кроме 3 частей игры, о которой я напишу позже.

Геймплей: мы играем за трех персонажей сразу и просто переключаемся между ними, чтобы сражаться или решать головоломки. Персонажи: Рыцарь Понтий, Воровка Зоя и Волшебник Амадей. Эти трое были зачарованы магическим артефактом под названием Trine, и теперь игроку предстоит разузнать что это за артефакт и как перестать быть связанным с персонажами.

Кооператив: в игре присутствует кооп режим, который я не пробовал, но людям, которым нравятся играть в одиночку, проходить игру будет удобно.

Кол-во ачивок - 33 (легкие); кол-во карточек - 8. | The game boasts an exceptionally high-quality production, making it a model for two to three-player games. However, the flaws in the mechanics of the first instalment are evident, with significant differences in the efficiency of different characters when progressing through levels. This disparity is especially pronounced in multiplayer mode, where some characters can feel quite underwhelming. | 6.5/10 還算很有意思的小遊戲，可以全程跟朋友連線(最多三名玩家)!! 可以趁特價買起來玩:)
 | Trine is a bit old but the visuals are still amazing. Played through with my gf and we had loads of laughs and good times.

Highly recommend! This is one of my all-time favorite word games. It's funny, well written, and very challenging as the levels progress. Like Bookworm, this game is a solid word puzzler and requires a little thought in order to maximize points. If there's a drawback it's a slight one - the play over once you've beaten the game is a little tedious as there's nothing new added. | Bookworm Adventures was a good game. It's still pretty good, as was the last one. I throroughly enjoyed it when i was playing through Book 4 and I can't wait to get into the other two!

Hope to see more of these games in the future! [possibly BwA3?] | If you enjoyed Bookworm, but wanted a sense of place and a bit of narrative, you've come to the right place. Book Adventures (volume one or two)  features a light-hearted story, some amusing banter, and attractive, colorful graphics. Thrill, at your new-found sense of purpose, as you strive to further a story, instead of just playing for points/until you get bored. Two antlers up! | This is one of those games, where the more the merrier. Except when more is a bunch of 3 year olds who are so impresed they can spell a 4 letter word out of the pot and cries when you go with hypotenuse instead of deck. However this game not only gives you a small education that can be tollorated and used to trick parents into believing it is actually homework, it is one of those few games that parents can look over your shoulder and be helpful and not recoil in disgust as you succsessfully knife someone and are welcome with hi-def satisfaction, or in your mother's case, hi-def reasons to ban that game. However that's another game. In this game when your mom looks over your shoulder she has the power to pull out words that make no sense, and somehow ending up being a "Fantastic" or "Astonishing" word that takes the enemy out in one hit.
This is one of the few educational games out there that I can recomend for doing something almost unheard of. Having the game be fun and the mechanics be educational. | Very similar to Volume 1, but makes it obsolete since it's slightly better in every way.  While still pretty easy, gameplay is highly creative.

Game Name: Batman: Arkham Asylum Game of the Year Edition
Reviews: Not Recommended

Game Name: Batman: Arkham Asylum Game of the Year Edition
Reviews:
Batman: Arkham Asylum was a pretty good experience except for the same boss schemes. Also this game has such a good PC port that I didn't even do a game configuration before going into the game. | Дивна річ ця пам’ять. У моїх спогадах, Психлікарня відповідала на 85% тому, що я побачив під час цього перепроходження, але враження та емоції були геть інші. Так вийшло, що перше знайомство відбулося з Arkham City, бо на той момент якраз була куплена нова відеокарта, а друг казав, що ця гра виглядає неймовірно й дуже вибаглива. Тож нереально приємно провівши час, десь за рік взявся за Asylum і по відчуттям, це було наче після Темного лицаря дивитися Бетмен: Початок. І те, і те – гарні фільмі, і те, і те – круті ігри, але коли вже побачив щось краще в тому ж усесвіті зі своїми правилами й механіками, початкові варіанти сприймаються звісно ж слабше. Проте, на момент написання рецензії, це відчуття недорозвинених ідей чи аспектів не повернулося, тому ще в першу ігрову сесію завершив проєкт на 33%, провівши з двома хвилинними перервами 7 годин.

Сюжет простий і зрозумілий, подиву викликати не має, хіба що в людей, які не знають хто такий Брюс Вейн. Починається все з того, що Джокер без проблем віддається в руки Бетмену й вони прямують у лікарню. Уже всередині закладу протагоніста не полишає думка, що це якийсь підступний план – звісно ж так і є. Поганець виривається на свободу й випускає різних суперзлочинців та хуліганів, які мають якомога довше затримувати Темного лицаря, щоб його супротивник міг утілювати свій підступний задум. Звісно ж під час проходження ми зустрінемо фан-сервіс… вибачте, усім знайомих ворогів – Страхопудала, Бейна, Плюща тощо. Я радий, що це відбулося, проте до них майже відсутнє якесь сценарне підведення (окрім Бейна, хіба що): вони виникають на нашому шляху й хочуть надавати кажану по вухах. Якщо перемішати їх місцями, зміни будуть незначні, а для загального бачення картини взагалі відсутні. Фінал теж доволі посередній, а порівнювати з Arkham City взагалі не варто – там у мене відвисла щелепа, а тут непоганий мордобій і все: відчуття наче це кінець сезону, а далі буде наступний.

Стосовно мордобою. Я не цікавився чи це оригінальна ідея, чи десь підгледіли, але саме в серії Arkham я вперше побачив цю систему вибивання всього лaйнa із супротивників. Першу серію ударів Бетмен робить звичайні, а на кожний наступний удар нокаутує ворога на короткий проміжок часу, а гравцю треба лише вчасно тиснути удар, щоб протагоніст з певною анімацією сам підлітав до найближчої пики в напрямку камери – виглядає досі бомбезно й спроби повторити так і не перевершили Rocksteady Studios. Є ухилення в сторону чи через когось, але повністю відсутній блок, тому для вдалого перехоплення атаки треба в таймінг тиснути контрудар – інакше комбо буде збито, а наш герой отримає шкоду. Може на словах це якась 2-3-кнопочна боївка (що так і є, хе-хе), але на практиці купа поганців може швидко обламати кажану крильця, не кажучи вже про те, як круто виглядає битва без пропущених ударів. До речі, на високій складності, яку я вибрав, над головою хуліганів відсутній індикатор, тому треба самому уважно дивитися хто коли б’є.

Щодо іншого ігрового процесу, то це метроїдванія без необхідності в примусовому порядку йти в попередні локації та потрапляти в раніше закриті зони через відсутність певних ґаджетів. Окрім декодера, для якого Бетмен використав спеціальну картку, трохи дивно спостерігати за тим, як він свої ж інструменти не носить із собою, а бере тільки в певний момент. Деякі, як от подвійний бетаранг, можна отримати лише в меню прокачки. За різні дії, знаходження секретів, набивання великих комбо видають досвід, який підвищує рівень. За кожний можна вибрати будь-яке одне відкрите покращення: асортимент невеликий, це або посилення фізичних ударів і збільшення здоров’я, чи просто розширення можливостей вищезгаданих ґаджетів, що загалом не є необхідним по сюжету, а слугує задля колекціонування.

Так, ніхто нікого не змушує кудись там іти, але ж самому хочеться, і це великий плюс. Територія лікарні невелика, але в різних закутках і не дуже знаходяться аудіозаписи сеансів з місцевими пацієнтами, що складає певне враження про їхній характер чи хід думок. На локаціях можна знайти купу щелеп Джокера, які направляють гравця на основний шлях: їх знищення дає досвід і відкриває загадки Ріддлера (я його буду так звати, бо український варіант – Загадник – мені якось не до вподоби). Окрім цього, він розкидав фігурки знаків питання, більшість з яких потребує саме прокачаних ґаджетів. Звісно ж не обійшлося без загадок: у більшості кімнат треба знайти щось, що є відповіддю на них. Для цього необхідно використати унікальну механіку детектива: Бетмен починає бачити все навколо в рентгені з підсвідкою об’єктів та інформацією щодо оточення; якщо затиснути клавішу, то відбувається аналіз, а при влучному наведенні – загадка відмічається як розгадана. Усього їх 240, тому вистачить усім. У нагороду відкриються спеціальні випробування та моделі персонажів у головному меню.

Повертаючись до вражень. У ті часи я грав як є, головне, щоб був текстовий переклад, а якщо в меню не можна було змінити озвучення, то я не шукав способів зробити це інакше. Але, Asylum була після City, тому мені не вистачало тих самих голосів. А на озвучення трьох головних ролей тут узяли найкращих – голоси з мультсеріалу 1992-1995 рр, які не тільки для мене є ідеальними для своїх персонажів – Кевін Конрой у ролі Бетмена, Марк Гемміл у ролі Джокера, Арілін Соркін у ролі Гарлі Квінн. Ніякий Крістіан Бейл, Гіт Леджер, Марґо Роббі їм не рівня. Комісара Ґордона озвучує Том Кейн, який теж професіонал, але трохи не той Джим, якого голосом грав Боб Гейстінгз, проте й роль тут невелика. Відчутним мінусом є сама якість цих реплік: на тлі чіткого саундтреку, фрази звучать так, наче звук стиснено заради економії місця; гадаю десь на студії лежать оригінали, але їх ми ніколи не почуємо, якщо не випустять раптовий ремастер, як це сталося з Quake II, де нам надали можливість грати з lossless-треками.

Щодо технологічної частини, то тут усе складно. З однієї сторони гра 2009 року, тому очікувати щось не варто, але з іншої, того ж року вийшла Call of Duty: Modern Warfare 2, що тоді було просто «вау». Ще можна згадати м’ясну Prototype, Assassin's Creed II з деталізованим оточенням, Left 4 Dead 2 з гарними анімаціями облич, Red Faction: Guerrilla з проривною фізикою. Загалом, Бетмен погано зберігся: текстури страшнуваті, персонажі просто відкривають рот з мертвим виразом обличчя, модельки якісь трохи широкі й непропорційні, купа дверей з підвантаженням, пререндерені ролики низької якості, загальне відчуття низької частоти кадрів через анімації руху, зроблені з низьким fps, шрифти субтитрів не масштабуються після Full HD тощо. Тому рекомендую [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1159691355/][b]цей посібник[/b][/url]. 

У моєму профілі можна подивитися скріншоти як виглядатиме. Я встановлював Asylum Reborn, який іде одразу з оновленим лаунчером; AsylumHD та Asylum 4K. Що це дає? Текстури на всіх поверхнях і моделях матимуть якісний оновлений вигляд та разом з катсценами будуть у 4k. Покращений запускач дасть змогу без проблем вибрати будь-яку роздільну здатність і надасть доступ до недоступних у стандартній версії параметрів, включно з тими, які активують моди. Вбудована технологія NVIDIA PhysX працюватиме належним чином і в повну силу, що не тільки надасть фізичну модель кожному папірцю в частих стосах, але й усі цеглини чи інші предмети взіємодіятимуть з моделями: особливо круто на вулиці ходити й розкидувати листя на підлозі. Єдине місце, де всі ці покращення можуть навантажити систему, це сутичка зі Страхопудалом, де на екрані сотні маленьких об’єктів, що лікується сучасним залізом або середніми налаштуваннями PhysX.

Якщо подобається Бетмен чи якась інша гра серії Arkham – рекомендую зіграти, тим паче є гарний [url=https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=1914493673/][b]українізатор[/b][/url]. Якщо ні, то я не знаю навіщо фанат Kingdome Come читає цю рецензію. | It is a great beginning to the Arkhamverse. I loved it when I first played it on the console, and it still holds up all these years later. It's a shame that the same can't be said about Rocksteady | До цього часу не грав в жодну частину Batman. Навіть жодного ролику чи огляду не бачив.  Гра мене здивувала своєю простотою та якістю. Навіть зараз ця гра виглядає достойно. 
Світ створений в темних тонах, все в стилі DC. Легкий та зрозумілий сюжет. Доволі велика, умовно, відкрита карта. Бо в деякі місця можливо дістатися пройшовши по сюжету і отримавши нові гаджети.  
Якісно озвучені герої. Відчувається їхнє безумство та психологічний розлад.  Їхній біографічний опис повністю втілений в гру їхніми діями.  Намальовані вони також прикольно. Особливо Джокер у фінальному файті. Я прям кайфанув від його вигляду.
І так...!!!м  Самий мед, сама насолода в грі - це бойова механіка. Ти ніби створюєш музичний твір набираючи більше комбо в такт натиснутими клавішами. Кожен бій можна виграти по різному. Любиш прямий контакти - то в перед, головне вирубити першим того хто із зброєю. А можна діяти, як справжній хижак. Полювати на кожного окремо. Так круто спостерігати за панікою тих ворогів, що залишаються живими. Їхнє серцебиття частішає, уважність стає меншою і як наслідок - неминучий, тихий нокаут.
Цю гру варто спробувати тому хто в неї не грав. І можна зіграти між сесіями нинішнього конвеєрного ігро-світу. Однозначно рекомендую! | great linear cinematic game. the art direction is beautiful and the claustrophobic disturbing atmosphere of the asylum is great. plot is intriguing as it sets in a narrow period between a clearly long, filled past and questions of what could come after it.  interactive storytelling is professional as i felt like the game knew what i would think and where i would go as an impulse, numerous times. combat is fluent and enjoyable. batman's body shape is goofy af. definitely recommend it and the games came after it, the quality just gets better like a snowball with each game of the series.

Osmos is a game that admittedly is somewhat special to me, in light that it was one of the items acquired for the still-deemed-to-be-almost-completely-insignificant 8th Grade Graduation event in 2010, yet also a completely baffling, confounding, fundamentally broken experience.

I haven't the foggiest of clues how literally [b]anyone[/b] could try to play through 2 of the three level branches in-game, and not only deem it a [b]finished product[/b] that's ready to send to market, but also charge $10 for it. Similarly, I very much want to know which game everybody that pushed its Metacritic Score up to [b]EIGHTY[/b] was playing, and/or how much of it was done so before passing judgement.

To delve into what's wrong with this slow, plodding, almost-entirely-unengaging disaster, I first need to have you, dear reader, imagine you're playing literally any game with a level (style of game doesn't matter), and end goal for said stage. 

Now imagine that instead of making sure you have even the [b]chance[/b] of [b]starting to play[/b] this level, you instead need to repeatedly pause and generate a new map to make sure the game bothers giving you collision to stand on, then literally anything else that's needed to clear said stage.

I would say “This is at least two levels in Osmos”, however, this analogy is not over, because even if the game you're imagining gives you a starting piece of terrain, allows you to move within it, and grants you the equipment needed to have a chance at beating the stage, no guarantee exists the end goal was generated alongside it, 

This is to say that after spending sometimes up to 10 minutes trying to beat this stage, you can be at the second to last action needed to fulfil the objective, only to find the switch you needed to push, unit you needed to spawn, and/or edge of the platform you need to jump from to get to the goal is completely missing.

Guess what this means you need to do? Keep generating a new map until the basics are granted, then hope the game gave you a complete level that can finished this time around.

[b][u]This is to say that levels in Osmos are not designed, they're generated, and not only that, seemingly nothing by any flags, checks, or programs are in-place to make sure said stage can be completed was bothered to be programmed[/u][/b], making the gameplay loop “play until you get stuck on a level, regenerate said level until you can even start to play it, and hope that the system blessed you with the apparently unheard-of privilege of being able to beat said stage.

I have gone back to this game at least twice since acquiring it almost 15 years ago, and each time, I reached a “level” that's not only entirely reliant on RNG to be able to not only do anything at-all in, but seemingly completely unable to be finished.

The first revisit saw one of the “Force” clusters be perpetually beyond even beginning, and while the A3B cluster seemed doable at first, after – no joke – at least 30 restarts, 1 hour and a half wasted, and only 15 that I wasn't completely blocked out of doing anything with, none of those were finished.

It gets worse, though, because in order to have a chance at defeating any enemy (in this case stationary blobs for most of the levels I bothered even trying to play) you – so to speak – need to take health from yourself, and give it to whichever adversary you may be facing. This already sounds completely unreasonable, but once you assimilate the “Health” of the other enemy, you grow to their size, unable to get through corridors, and use weaker ones to hope to try and beat the bigger ones, while hoping beyond hope nothing happens to give imperative health to your adversary, causing it to grow bigger, and completely block you off from progressing.

[b][u]The fundamental laws of game design state:[/u][/b]

1: If you must have a randomiser take the place of intentional design, include checks, and flags, then redundancy on redundancy to make sure every level can be completed via player agency, and skill, rather than the randomiser putting everything in.

2: Once these are in-place, make absolutely sure that everything it makes can be consistently completed, playing each level multiple times, and perhaps have multiple people also do so, to increase the amount of tested instances/generations.

3: Once everything is confirmed to be working [b][u]then[/u][/b] publish it.

As such, we reach the

[b][u]Verdict:[/u][/b] A seemingly-untested, unfinished-feeling frustration-fest that relies entirely on luck to allow the player to do anything, with two levels either taking hours of restarts to beat, or otherwise are completely impossible to finish.

[b][u]Placed In:[/u][/b] Were this acquired on any other occasion, I would have 0 qualms whatsoever about ousting it from my account such that I never have the temptation to be disappointed by it in the future again, but as it stands, it's shakily at 6: Traumatically Toxic, and “Remove it anyway.” | Klassiker

I've had this game for a while and only recently picked it back up. It's a pretty cool concept and a nice brain exercise for puzzle lovers (not to mention addictive as hell). One big issue, though, is that transition sequences have blindingly bright, totally unnecessary flashing light animations. I have to play this game with my monitor on the lowest brightness setting--otherwise it gives me a migraine. | The music is good, but the game play is an absolute mess.

It's too easy to make marbles move when you don't want them to.

Also, both holding the left mouse button can 'freeze' time as well as launch a marble, making it very easily to fire a marble in the wrong place, thus failing a puzzle quickly. The right mouse button does the SAME thing. Not sure why they couldn't fix this by just holding right mouse to freeze time, and left click to launch marbles.

There also doesn't seem to be any solution guides to all of the puzzles, so if you get stuck, game over. :\

Maybe the developers can do some kind of rare update to fix the issues, but I have doubts about it happening.

I can't really recommend this game. There are much better puzzle games out there with better controls. | This game is sort of interesting, but...If you are a heavy puzzle fan who must play everything, go for it, but, I warn you, you've probably seen this before. If you aren't...find a better version. This is a 3d puzzle in which colored pieces drop onto the field while you spin the field so the pieces land on a group of like colored spheres, which will then explode. Detonate a group surrounding another colored piece, and that piece will explode upward and then drop, burning away like colored spheres, and possibly causing more explosions. Quantz's one unique feature is that your pieces are mostly free moving. Shake the field and the pieces move. Shake hard, and everything goes flying, before resettling into a (hopefully) better position. For a puzzle game, Quantz is pretty easy. The only time I've ever failed a stage was I tried to do something fancy, and ignored my timer. | QuantZ isn't bad, and has some surprising plus points. Visually the game has aged remarkably well, slowdown on some transitions aside, and the audio is pleasant, if repetitive. In fact, 'pleasant but repetitve' sum this puzzle game up quite neatly. It has a decent amount of content for a puzzler, is easy to pick up and play, and has a fairly interesting premise. It just gets dull too swiftly.

The idea is to fling coloured balls down towards a cube that you can rotate at will - a match game with the twist that you can reposition the balls already in play by spinning the cube. This sounds good, and you can do some bizarre and wacky things with the physics, but in practice you're cracking a nut with a sledgehammer. The game was designed for a touchscreen, and it's difficult to finesse individual spheres about the place; mostly you'll resort to flailing the cube wildly and hoping that everything resettles in a more favourable configuration. There are other gimmicks to spice up gameplay, but the tried-and-tested formula is always present.

I spent a decent amount of time with the game, and found that although Action and Strategy modes both have twelve distinct worlds, they may as well be the same game mode. You'll very rarely run out of time or balls in the latter, so you can treat it in the same manner as you would the former. I blitzed through the Action section and had a decent time of it, but things got stale pretty sharpish. The Puzzle mode consists of preset playing fields with a very low number of balls to play with...you'll have to caress them with a delicate touch, and complete the eruptions in as few strokes as possible. Ahem. It was a welcome distraction, but ultimately when things got difficult (and some of the achievements are absolutely dastardly), I found myself wondering why I was still playing.

2009 wasn't exactly an eon ago, but in terms of games on Steam it's about as ancient as the Steam Age itself. QuantZ was probably facing a less cluttered puzzle field back then; nowadays, with so many other options available, I can't recommend a game this limited. | [quote][b]W A R N I N G[/b][/quote]

Non-Windows users: as of the writing of this review, this game still does not work with any version of Proton — it simply fails to start. You can find more details on [u][url=https://www.protondb.com/app/37800]Proton DB[/url][/u].

WillowEngine.ini

Game Name: Borderlands Game of the Year Enhanced
Reviews:
Terrible remaster that adds few QoL fixes and nothing else.

Pros:

- You automatically collect the ammo
- There's an in-game map
- You can use modern resolutions

Cons: 

- No bugs were fixed:  Enemies still fall through the map, pathfinding 100 % broken for AI etc.
- New bugs added: Moxxi Underdome music disappears whenever it feels like it, never addressed. 
- You STILL need to edit .ini file to remove mouse acceleration. Some QoL changes that are possible to change from. ini, crash the game
- There's a memory leak that was never fixed, no matter how much community tried to raise the issue
- Randy Pitchford is still in charge
- Borderlands 4, despite all the half-assed stuff in the remaster is advertised in the main menu like a mobile game pop-up and is the only thing that 100 % works in this case.

I remember having played this game when I was a younger and wanting to try it again... I've played a lot of ARPGs in my time and this game just isn't good, not with the lots of other games there are nowadays and that were there even during its time. I didn't go into it with wanting to dislike it, but have not really found many things to like, or at the very least enough for me to like the game, enjoy my experience, and give it a positive review.

I'm not a fan of the graphics, but that's always been the least important aspect when it comes to games for me, but I can't believe this game is from 2009 judging from... well, everything. The graphics didn't age well (looks like a cheap mobile game), amount of classes (3?!), mechanics, skills and skill trees (every class has 15 active and 15 passive skills), loot (a lot of trash drops) and the controls and combat - very clunky, I tried playing a Vanquisher (kind of a Rogue/Marksman class) and the ranged attacks usually either didn't even connect or only had range for about half the screen.

I'd have expected the game to be at least 10 years older than that, everything just feels so lackluster and jank for its time. If it were, I wouldn't have been so harsh with the review but simply put, there were games that were miles ahead at the time - Titan Quest or Diablo II, which lo and behold, are still very good and playable to this day, even in spite of being older.

There are some nice ideas, like the pet, being able to send it back to town to sell your items. If only the inventory wasn't 3x7, while also having to carry scrolls and potions, making it at least 4 slots smaller. Other than that though, the pet is just basically a way worse and dumbed-down version of the Diablo II mercenary. The only other "good" thing about the game is that you can mod it and the mods don't disable steam achievements, at least the ones I installed. This would be good if the base game itself was good and if some mods just didn't feel mandatory to make the experience less painful.

Now if we move on to the cons, other than everything already mentioned above, there is no respec, why? Yes, there is a mod for it, but still. There were games before its time that had this mechanic, so why does this game not have it?

I am playing in very hard softcore and the game still feels very easy regardless of that, which brings me to the balance being very poor - still remember my first death, which was to a trapped chest dealing over 50% of my health in a zone 5 levels below me, while literally every single other trap I've triggered dealt about 1/10 of the damage of this one, pretty much not even moving my health bar. I just don't get it. On top of that, the monster damage on very hard gets absurd very quickly, even before completing the story you're gonna start getting constantly oneshot with very little counterplay, unless you're of course kiting around half the map and standing half a screen away from the mobs.

This game didn't bring anything new at the time that would be meaningful and worthwhile enough to mention. Unless you're going into the game with extremely strong nostalgia, can't recommend. It is cheap though, so I'll at least give it that. | . São 3 personagens fixos e sem nome, não tem como customizar a aparência, cada um é uma classe diferente.

Saving the world? That's boring. Playing an evil lord and parodying the fantasy genre is much more fun.

In Overlord 2, you will try out the role of the new Dark Lord, with whom you will set out to plunder the land and spread evil. Mainly with the help of your chatty and tireless goblin minions.

From the cold glacial cave, your heavy steps will lead you through snowy gorges and along the way you will sow destruction and death around you. Then comes the tropical land of the annoying marijuana elves and their annoying dances. We will also go to the underworld to the dark land of the old, already defeated dark lord. And finally, we will go to massacre the land of our archenemy - the Roman Empire led by Emperor Solarius.
The game takes place in relatively large levels, which are visually very variable and offer constant enjoyment. Although it is a more or less linear experience, it at least gives a sense of freedom.

Overlord II is a successful sequel to the first game. Although there could be at least one new goblin class and more frequent saves. [b] 55% [/b] | Péssimo!!!  | The game also comes with a DLC, which includes the following items:

1. A Toxic Community: Mistakes are rarely forgiven. Unless you’re playing with friends, be prepared to face harsh criticism, often from younger players. The game’s multiplayer is largely populated by school-aged players who don’t hold back.


2. Disruptive Adults: It’s not just the kids causing chaos—some adults blast music through their microphones, assuming everyone else shares their taste. Spoiler: they don’t.


3. Frequent AFKs: Teamwork can fall apart when a teammate goes inactive, whether they’re brewing tea, taking a smoke break, or simply wandering off mid-game. And yes, it often happens right after you’ve generously used your first aid kit on them.


4. Team Abandonment: Lone wolves running off to the far corners of the map, only to be overwhelmed by infected, are a common sight. They’re quick to flood the chat with colorful language before rage-quitting the game.


5. Difficulty Disputes: Some players join games on "Expert" difficulty only to demand a downgrade. If their request is denied, they might sabotage the team before leaving the server entirely.


6. Vote Kicks: Occasionally, you’ll encounter players who inexplicably start a vote to kick you from the game. When you ask why? Crickets.



The Verdict: Despite the chaotic community, Left 4 Dead 2 remains a phenomenal experience. The graphics are a significant step up from the first game, the mechanics feel more polished, and there’s a greater variety of weapons and infected to enjoy. However, surviving the online experience without a calming remedy might be just as challenging as surviving the zombie apocalypse itself. | [h1]写了800字的推荐文，手欠点了一下"否"全没了。不说了血压高了,头晕。[/h1]总之就是《关于一个萌新GMOD玩久了无聊直接去玩L4D1多人因太菜反复被僵尸虐而被队友抛弃伤心自责卸载游戏过半年好奇进L4D2知道玩单人熟悉官图及玩法过程中发现了能打MOD结果一发不可收拾地搜各种进阶攻略教程提升自己游戏体验和能力努力不坑队友可仍然很菜但是很感谢带萌新入坑的朋友们以及创意工坊的大佬们给这游戏第二次生命的事》 | Крутая игра для игры с друзьями (которые в это не играют)! Есть редкие достижения, куча пушек и толпа зомби, которая будет медленно наступать на пятки и их съедать. В общем, весело, рекомендую. | Left 4 Dead 2 (L4D2), released by Valve in 2009, is the gold standard for cooperative zombie shooters. Featuring intense survival gameplay, smart AI, and an incredible atmosphere, L4D2 delivers an unmatched multiplayer experience. With its fast-paced action, diverse weapons, and unpredictable enemy encounters, this game remains one of the most thrilling and replayable co-op shooters ever made.

Gameplay – Pure, Adrenaline-Fueled Action
L4D2 is all about co-op survival. You and three teammates must fight through hordes of the undead, navigating through various maps and completing objectives to reach safety. The key to survival? Teamwork, strategy, and adaptability.

The gunplay is tight and satisfying, with a wide selection of weapons including assault rifles, shotguns, SMGs, sniper rifles, and melee weapons like axes, katanas, and even frying pans! Every encounter feels dynamic, thanks to the AI Director, which adjusts the difficulty based on your team’s performance, ensuring no two playthroughs are ever the same.

Special Infected – Enemies That Keep You on Edge
Beyond the standard zombie horde, L4D2 introduces Special Infected that force players to work together:

Tank – A massive brute that can throw debris and crush survivors.
Witch – A terrifying enemy that, if startled, can instantly incapacitate a survivor.
Smoker – Uses a long tongue to drag players away from their team.
Hunter – A fast, agile infected that pounces on survivors and pins them down.
Boomer – Explodes in a shower of bile, attracting a massive horde.
Charger – Charges through groups, slamming a survivor into the ground.
Spitter – Creates pools of acid that deal heavy damage.
Each Special Infected forces different team strategies, making communication and positioning absolutely crucial.

Campaigns & Maps – A Horror Movie Experience
L4D2 features multiple campaigns, each set in diverse, apocalyptic locations across the southern U.S.:

Dead Center – A chaotic mall escape reminiscent of classic zombie films.
The Parish – A tense race across New Orleans to reach an evacuation zone.
Swamp Fever – A creepy, foggy swamp filled with infected dangers.
Hard Rain – A unique campaign featuring a devastating hurricane that changes the environment.
Dark Carnival – A fan-favorite, featuring a deadly amusement park with a thrilling rollercoaster finale.
Each campaign feels like a mini zombie movie, packed with cinematic set pieces, interactive environments, and intense finales.

Multiplayer & Game Modes – Endless Replayability
L4D2 offers several game modes that keep the action fresh:

Campaign Mode – Classic co-op survival through story-driven levels.
Versus Mode – One team plays as survivors, while the other controls the Special Infected.
Survival Mode – See how long you can last against endless waves of zombies.
Scavenge Mode – A competitive mode where teams race to collect fuel cans while being hunted.
Mutation Mode – Weekly game modifiers that add fun twists to gameplay.
Thanks to modding support and the Steam Workshop, the community has also created hundreds of custom maps, weapons, and campaigns, making L4D2’s replayability practically infinite.

Graphics & Sound – Immersive and Timeless
Even years after release, L4D2’s atmospheric lighting, detailed environments, and gruesome effects hold up well. Zombies react realistically to gunfire, and the sound design is masterful, with eerie background noises, terrifying growls from Special Infected, and intense musical cues that heighten the suspense.

The voice acting and character interactions bring the survivors to life, making them memorable and adding humor to the chaos.

Why Left 4 Dead 2 is a Must-Play
L4D2 is the perfect blend of action, horror, and co-op gameplay. Whether you’re playing with friends or AI teammates, the intense combat, unpredictable enemy encounters, and endless replayability make every match a thrilling adventure.

🔹 Final Rating: 10/10
Left 4 Dead 2 is a masterpiece of cooperative gaming. If you love zombies, action, and teamwork, this is an absolute must-play that still delivers endless fun and excitement after more than a decade.

To put simply: my favorite video game of all time.

The first Bioshock is a great game, but it isn’t perfect. It suffers from odd level design and a messy final act. But despite its short development time, Bioshock 2 takes everything great about the first game and streamlines it. Gone are the old PC-era RPG elements and bullet-spongy bosses. The way research works in this game promotes more variety in gunplay, pushing players to try plasmid and weapon combos they might normally not. This makes 2 extremely replayable.

The story here elaborates on a small but important part of Bioshock: the Big Daddies and Little Sisters. Putting you in the shoes of an “old-school” Daddy that supposedly existed before the events of the first game, Delta somehow manages to help us feel so much more than Jack ever did.

Our relationship with Eleanor is moving and organic. Lamb feels like a great successor villain-wise to the loud and proud Ryan. Bioshock 2's story is weirdly similar to Neon Genesis Evangelion, but with a Socialism-fearing American twist. Through themes of fatherhood battling unrighteous use of equality and unity, our actions feel much more fleshed out than the black-and-white “choice” in Bioshock (which is ironic considering that game’s main message). This game makes your choices feel like they really matter.

2 abandons a plot twist and a final boss to focus more on its spectrum of endings, which feel natural based on our choices and their influence. If Delta is good, Eleanor becomes good. If Delta is evil, Eleanor becomes evil. If Delta made mixed/nonsensical choices, Eleanor becomes broken and confused. This is especially great with how thought-provoking some of the choices are: like does Gil deserve to live, or should he be mercy-killed as he previously asked? Not to forget the Mark Meltzer subplot, which is its own whole fascinating journey that was originally revealed through an ARG before 2 released.

The multiplayer is pretty great despite how often people cite it as feeling "tacked on." Clearly a decent amount of love was put into it, even if it is unbalanced (all you need is Electro Bolt and the damage-upgraded crossbow).

This was my first Bioshock game, but I think even if I had played the first game first, I’d know that this is the better game. And probably the greatest shooter of all time." Love is just a chemical, we give it meaning by choice." Wild that some people think this story is weaker... | Great game but even worse port than the first one. INI tweaks should not be necessary to run without constant crashing. | Fantástico! Bioshock 2 é uma sequência muito mais que digna do primeiro jogo, além de dar um upgrade na jogabilidade, continua a entregar um enredo envolvente com uma história profunda e que levanta reflexões desta vez mostrando o outro extremo, contrário ao ideal individualista de Andrew Ryan. Sophia Lamb não é uma vilã tão marcante quanto o Andrew, mas exerce o seu papel muito bem, trazendo à tona a loucura que é a busca por uma coletividade absoluta. É uma lei universal, é uma característica intrínseca à toda sociedade: todo extremismo produz inevitavelmente um outro extremismo contrário a si mesmo.

[h1] Devam oyunu dediğin böyle olur [/h1]

Serinin ilk oyununu bitirdikten sonra devamında nasıl bir bağlantı var diye merak ediyordum. Bu oyunda tekrardan Rapture'ın derinliklerine yolculuk yapıyoruz. Yani aslında yolculuk yapmıyoruz rapture'ın içerisinde başlıyoruz. İlk oyunu bıraktığımız yerden devam ediyoruz dersek yanlış olmaz. Görsel ve teknik güncellemeler, iyileştirmeler sayesinde hikayeyi daha güzel ve detaylı tanıyoruz. Hikayenin daha fazla derinliklerine iniyoruz.

[h3] Hikaye ve Arka Plan:[/h3]
İlk oyunda, Jack olarak Rapture'ın korkunç sırlarını ortaya çıkarırken Andrew ve Fontaine gibi güçlü karakterleri ortadan kaldırmıştık. Bioshock 2'de ise bu yaşanan olayların üzerinden yaklaşık 8 yıl geçmiş bulunmakta. Hangi yıllarda oynadığımızı oyunların başlarında gösteriyordu dikkat edenler bunu fark etmiştir. Şaşırdığım ve aşırı mutlu eden şey ise bu oyunda bir '' Big Daddy '' olan Deltayı kontrol ediyoruz. Yani ana karakterimiz Big Daddy olan Delta. İkinci oyunun hikayesi birinci oyuna göre daha kişisel bir hikaye. Çünkü asıl amacımız Little Sister olan Eleanor'u korumak ve kurtarmak.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3410322464
Hikaye, Sophia Lamb adında bir antagonist ile şekilleniyor. Benim gözümde kendisi yine kendini bilmez ilk oyunun boss'larına benziyor. Kendi hedefi için gerekirse Rapture'u yok edebilecek birisinden bahsediyoruz. Böyle diyince aklıma Griffith'i getirdi :d. Lamb, Ryan'ın bireycilik odaklı felsefesinin tam zıttı bir anlayışı savunuyor. Topluluk odaklı bir ideolojiyi benimsiyor. Ama bunu yaparken dediğim gibi her zaman kendi önceliğini düşünüyor. Topluluk ideolojisi adı altında onun için çalışanlara biz aileyiz vesaire şeklinde konuşup askerlerinin fedakarlık yapmasını istiyor. Manipüleci birisi olduğunu da unutmayalım.

[h3] Hikaye'nin Derinliği: [/h3]
Yukarıda da bahsettiğim gibi, ikinci oyunun hikayesi daha kişisel ve daha duygusal bir temele dayanıyor. Eleanor ile olan bağımız, oyun boyunca hissettiriliyor. Hem hikaye hem de oynanış açısından karakterimizi motivasyon ediyor. Tabii bazı yerler için oyuncuyu da motive ediyor. Sophia Lamb'ın ideolojisi ve eylemleri, Ryan'ın bireycilik felsefesine derin bir tezat oluşturuyor. Bence bu önemli ve hikayeye derinlik katan bir unsur.

Ve en güzel kısımlardan birisi. Oyunda verdiğimiz kararlar Eleanor'un kaderini değiştiriyor. İnsanları öldürecek miyiz yoksa affedecek miyiz ? Aynı şekilde Little Sister'ları hasat mı edicez yoksa kurtarıcaz mı. Bunların hepsi oyuncuya kalmış ve böyle şeylerin oyunu etkilediğini de unutmamak lazım. Verdiğimiz kararlar Eleanor'un etik kararlarını sorgulamasına neden oluyor. Hem kişisel hem de toplumsal temalar işlendiği için, bioshock serisinin felsefi derinliği bu oyunda da devam ediyor.

[h3] Ses Tasarımı: [/h3]
İlk oyunda olduğu gibi bu oyunda da ses tasarımı, atmosfer yaratımında yine harikalar yaratıyor. Big Daddy'nin duyulan adım sesleri, dalgaların derinden gelen yankıları, splicer'ların diyalogları, çıkarttığı sesler, ana ve yan karakterlerin tepkileri ve konuşmaları olsun tatmin ediyor. İlk oyuna kıyasla ses tasarımında daha derin bir ambiyans hissediliyor. Yani ilk oyundan 8 yıl sonra geçtiği için Rapture'ın çürüyen altyapısını daha iyi hissediyoruz. Bu konuda tabii ki su sızıntıları ve mekanik bozulmalar gibi şeyler hikayeyi destekleyen detaylardan birisi.

Ek olarak Garry Schyman'ın bestelediği müzikler yine oyunun en büyük artılarından biri.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3410403327
[h3] Grafikler: [/h3]
Remastered sürüm olduğunu unutmamak lazım. Eski oyunun grafiklerini modern standartlara yakınlaştırmayı başarabilen bir remastered. İlk oyuna kıyasla dokular ve tasarımlar daha net. Işıklandırma efektleri ve çevre tasarımları daha detaylı. Akvaryum benzeri alanlarda gezinirken suyun yarattığı parlaklıkları ve kırılmaları görmek güzel. Kısaca grafiksel geliştirmeler oyun için yeterli ve oyunun atmosferine büyük bir katkı sağlıyor.

[h3] Skill Sistemi:[/h3]
İlk oyundan Plasmid'leri hatırlıyoruz. Devam oyununda ise bu sistemin geliştirilmiş bir halini kullanıyoruz. Yeni plasmid'ler ve eski favorilerin geliştirilmiş versiyonları savaşlarda daha fazla stratejik derinlik sunuyor. Big Daddy olarak kullanabileceğimiz silahları, Plasmid'ler ile eşzamanlı kullanma imkanı oyuna farklı bir hava katıyor. Kısaca skill sistemi ve mekanikler sayesinde savaşlar hala çok zevkli.

[h3] Kontroller ve Mekanikler: [/h3]
Hazır mekanikler demişken bu konuya da değinelim. Oyunda Big Daddy olarak oynamak sadece görsel olarak bir değişiklik sunmuyor. Oynanış mekaniğini de doğrudan etkiliyor. Delta olarak daha güçlü, daha dayanıklı ve daha donanımlıyız. En basiti oyunun başından da anlayabileceğimiz gibi Big Daddy'e özel bir silah ile başlıyoruz. Daha güçlü olduğumuz için de savaşırken biraz daha cesur davranabiliyoruz. Kontroller de ilk oyundaki gibi akıcı ve günümüze optimize edilmiş.

Ek olarak oyunun sonlarına doğru Little Sister'ların dünyayı nasıl gördüğünü göstermeleri efsane olmuş. Little Sister olarak kısa bir süreliğine oynuyoruz.
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3410402849
[h3] Düşman Çeşitliliği: [/h3]
Yani düşman çeşitliliği ilk oyuna benzer ama biraz daha değiştirilmiş ve geliştirilmiş versiyonları bizleri karşılıyor. Splicer'lar yine ana tehdit unsurlarından birisi. Ancak bu sefer oyunda Big Sister dediğimiz başka bir düşman türüyle de tanışıyoruz. Big Sister adından da anlaşıldığı gibi Big Daddy'nin kadın versiyonu. Ancak Big Daddy kadar ağır olmak yerine daha hızlı ve daha ölümcül bir düşman. Çok daha çevik ve daha tehlikeli. Sadece bize doğru gelirken çıkarttığı ürkütücü ses bile farklı şeyler hissettiriyor. (Bağıra bağıra geliyor)

Ek olarak oyunun ilerisinde splicer'lar daha zorlayıcı oluyor. Plazmidlerimize karşı farklı savunma yöntemleri oluyor.


Sonuç olarak Bioshock 2 Remastered, ilk oyunun bıraktığı mirası başarılı bir şekilde sürdürüyor. Hatta bazı yönleriyle seriyi daha ileriye taşıyan bir yapım olmuş. Rapture'ın hikayesine yeni katmanlar eklerken, oynanış ve atmosfer açısından da etkileyici ve unutulmaz bir deneyim sunuyor. Geliştirilmiş görseller, daha duygusal ve derin bir hikaye sayesinde mükemmel bir yapım olmuş. Tabii ki bazı şeylerin aynı olması ve aynı yerde geçmesi bazı oyuncuları sıkacaktır ama ben hikayeyi sevdiğimden ve ilgi çekici bulduğumdan öyle bir problem yaşamadım.

Its neat, but not as good as the original. Still probably worth it at the sorts of discounts it's been getting.

Theres a really big probolem: You have to pay resources upfront for everything. This does not sound bad on the face of it, but what this really means is that you issue a build order and it can sit in some hidden queue for 30 minutes/ unknown indeterminate time. Not quite how that queue works, but getting stuff you need done ASAP prioritised is a royal pain.
In Supreme commander 1 overdrawing on resources would slow down production, but you could still estimate when stuff got done and re-prioritize when neccessary.

Because its hard to estimate when anything gets done unless you float resources the default solution to everything is... turtle up, build deathball.. attack move, then force attack enemy commander. In the campaign, works 100% of the time.

Another problem is unit control. Pathfinding is not the best, Also units can wait around for reasons such as .. 1 unit is stlightly out of formation so eveybody must say perfectly still. Really messes with use of waypoints as your army randomly stops for long periods of time to reform a a different angle.

There is a unit cap. It looks like buildings also count, not just stuff that moves.
In large part the allure of Supreme Commander is the massive unit groups you can order around on a massive arena. Now feels like everything has been scaled back to a "sensible" scale. fewer units, less extreme experimental units.

Uma serie épica !!!

Felizmente, Metro Redux consegue se diferenciar nesse sentido ao trazer ao mercado um valor de produção muito grande, ao mesmo tempo em que resgata experiências já um tanto quanto antigas. Usando a versão mais recente da 4A Engine, o pacote permite reviver as experiências de Metro 2033 e Metro Last Light com gráficos revitalizados e com uma jogabilidade mais refinada do que a vista nas versões originais.

Tivemos a oportunidade de conferir a remasterização na íntegra e, nesta análise, trazemos tudo aquilo que você precisa saber sobre ela. Além disso, aproveitamos para retornar aos lançamentos originais para conferir o quanto elas se diferenciam do novo trabalho feito pela 4A Games.


Um novo fôlego para a franquia:

A principal novidade de Metro Redux fica por conta do uso da versão mais recente da 4ª Engine, que já se mostra bem adaptada aos requisitos da nova geração de consoles. Na prática, isso se reflete em modelos tridimensionais com uma qualidade melhor, em um novo sistema de iluminação e em texturas com um nível maior de detalhes.

O maior beneficiado pelo novo motor gráfico é Metro 2033, lançado no já distante ano de 2010. Embora o game ainda possa ser considerado belo (especialmente no PC), o trabalho feito pelos desenvolvedores conseguiu trazer a ele um novo nível de qualidade — o que deve ajudar a justificar o retorno daqueles que já conferiram a versão original.

Além de adotar modelos de personagens com uma qualidade maior de detalhes, o game ganha texturas em alta resolução que permitem apreciar melhor a direção de arte da 4A Games. O título também traz monstros com um visual aprimorado e diversas adições às suas animações, o que garante uma maior naturalidade de movimentos tanto para personagens humanos quanto para as criaturas mutantes que você deve enfrentar.

Metro 2033 também ganhou algumas atualizações em suas mecânicas de jogo, adotando um sistema de controles idêntico àquele visto na sequência Last Light. Outro ponto que mostra a dedicação dos desenvolvedores a realmente fazer um trabalho de qualidade são as cenas de corte do jogo, que agora são reproduzidas exclusivamente em primeira pessoa — com direito a diversos momentos interativos.


Experiência que se sustenta:

O ponto que mais se destaca no conteúdo visto em Metro Redux é a maneira como a franquia continua parecendo “fresca”, mesmo que seu primeiro capítulo tenha sido lançado há quase meia década. Muito disso se deve à ambientação explorada pela 4A Games, que se assemelha muito mais a um game do gênero Survival Horror do que a um FPS convencional.

Talvez ciente de que nem todos os jogadores podem se interessar por um título com certas restrições, o estúdio decidiu criar dois estilos de jogabilidade: Survival e Spartan. Enquanto o primeiro reduz a quantidade de munições e armamentos que você encontra (o que torna a experiência mais assustadora), o segundo age como um “jogo de tiro convencional”, permitindo que você seja mais descuidado durante os combates.

Independente da opção que você escolher, a experiência básica de ambos os jogos se mantém impressionantemente sólida. Grande parte disso se deve à presença de adversários com uma boa inteligência artificial (que sofreu aprimoramentos notáveis na versão Redux, especialmente em Metro 2033) e também à maneira como os combates são construídos.


Vale a pena? Muito bom mesmo vale muito a pena !!!

Devemos ser bem sinceros: caso você já tenha finalizado Metro 2033 e Metro Last Light, a aquisição de Metro Redux não é exatamente necessária — afinal, por maiores que sejam as melhorias apresentadas, em essência os jogos permanecem idênticos. No entanto, quem não pôde conferir as experiências em sua época de lançamento (ou simplesmente quer revivê-las) não poderia pedir muito mais da remasterização.

Nesse sentido, surge como vantagem a possibilidade de poder adquirir as duas versões Redux de forma individual através do meio digital. Dessa maneira, você pode escolher somente o título que mais lhe interessa, deixando de lado aquele com qual já tem mais familiaridade — algo que, devemos admitir, deve prejudicar um pouco as vendas de Last Light em sua versão para PC.

Caso você simplesmente nunca tenha entrado no universo de Metro, essa é a melhor opção para conhecer o universo da franquia. Metro: Redux é a versão definitiva dos dois títulos da série e seu grande nível de qualidade deixa uma boa perspectiva do que podemos esperar para os trabalhos futuros do estúdio 4A Games.


Pros:

* Jogabilidade renovada ajuda a atualizar Metro 2033
* Nova engine contribui para tornar os títulos ainda mais bonitos
* Modos de jogo agradam tanto aos fãs do terror quanto a quem gosta de jogos de tiro mais tradicionais

Oyun bundan fazlasını vaat ediyor ama o fazlası olan her şey 2010 senesi için bile çok dandik. 

Hikayede Rico ve ekibi helikopter ile Güneydoğu Asya'da bulunan rastgele bir diktatörlüğe amerikan emriyle demokrasi dağıtmaya gelir. Rico adaya varmak üzereyken bu adanın artık düşman bir hükümete sahip olduğunu öğrenir. Hemen sonrasında klasik helikoptere saldırı olur. Sonra da niyeyse Amerikan hükümeti ile alakalı çok önemli dosyaları helikopterde düşman topraklarına götürüyormuşuz ve onlar düşüp etrafa saçılır. Bu tarz başlayan ve bir kaka fırtınası olarak devam eden hikayeyi takmadığımız sürece kafamız rahat ediyor.

Neyse ki grappling hook ve onunla yapabileceklerimiz devreye girince özellikle dönemi için inanılmaz eğlenceli bir kaos yaratma serüveni başlıyor. Gameplay olarak düşmanlar ve gun play yine senesi için kötünün iyisi denebilir. Ki zaten çoğunlukla koşu silahla milleti taramak yerine etrafta uçup kaçıp bombalar fırlatıp her yeri patlatıyoruz şeklinde bir oynanışa sahibiz.

三年多以前重温完本作后，一直搁下没写测评。如今趁着玩游戏之外的空不少，终于能下笔补上了。我是在大学期间玩到本作的，印象极为深刻，十分喜爱，直到最近也仍然愿意重温。在热血无赖、黑道圣徒、破坏者等一众类GTA作品中，我最喜欢的就是这个系列。游戏讲述的虽是半个多世纪前远在美国的事情，但其叙述方式十分成熟。叠加上游戏本身带来的互动参与性，给了我极大的代入感，仿佛真的置身于那段关于家庭、友谊、忠诚、背叛的黑帮故事之中。游戏借鉴大量黑帮电影，剧作强大，演绎了一场动人心弦的大戏，结局令人怅然若失。无论是大雪纷飞的40年代，还是春意盎然，黄金时代般的50年代都各有千秋，每每开着里面的老爷车，听着经典的音乐，都是一种别样的享受。

[h2]既令人惊叹，又令人哀叹[/h2]
游戏对世界细节和系统的刻画简直到了迷恋的地步，令人惊叹之处多不胜数，有很多即使到续作中也无法比拟。举个例子，游戏中的加油站可以真的加油，有专门的动画，加油的人还会跟你闲聊。路人开车拐弯时会打转向灯，在雪地上走路会打滑，见到你偷车会报警，对你不爽会打架，闻到你身上的臭味会作出反应。他们的各种生活化动作极为丰富，有些甚至连主角都比不上。警察会侦测你超速和撞车等不法行为，会对你罚款，碰到麻烦可以加以贿赂，通缉分为对车和对人的。如果商店被抢，警察会上门调查。店员被杀的话则会关店，标记为犯罪现场。枪械射击不同位置的反应不同，血迹有脚印效果。近战有很多招式，还有终结技。电台会报道最近的事件，很多曲目都是精心挑选的，名字和歌词都与正在发生的剧情有所关联。雪有专门的物理效果，会被打散，汽车开起来以后，车顶的雪会被吹散融化，环境破坏效果强……

然而，游戏虽提供了一个庞大的世界，但实际空洞无趣，严重缺乏可交互性。所有公共交通工具无法使用，无法买车买房，几乎没有养成要素，没有多少能花钱的地方。没有支线任务，没有可探索地点，几乎没有选择，没有成长，在剧情之外几乎没有可以干的事情。无法游泳，甚至无法进到水里。开车的时候无法跳车，甚至无法在车内射击，直接少了近一半的射击乐趣，主线驾驶过于冗长。整体有种半成品的感觉，关于这一切的原因放在后面单独说。

[h2]逐章分解【剧透】[/h2]
游戏开场的回忆实际发生于游戏最后一章的开头，当时的维托得罪了两大家族和三合会，心如乱麻，于是通过看相册整理思绪。回忆中一家人初踏帝国湾土地时，仔细看动画就能在里面找到好几个后来会碰到的人物，比如码头老大及其手下、医生和克莱门特家族老大。维托一家当时住的那个破房子也有实景，可以进入，可惜在后续中再没有涉及。

第一章的标题为The Old Country，其实就是系列新作《黑手党：故乡》的副标题，预告片中出现的城镇就是第一章战斗发生的地图。维托于1925年出生在那里，1932年离开去往美国。这一章给人的感觉就是豪横，偌大的小镇有一大片精致的建模，敌人、武器、游击队、卡车、吉普车、坦克、飞机等主要的美术内容全都一股脑在极短时间内呈现出来，各种破坏效果也是一个接着一个。虽然游戏呈现的效果非常出色，但这仍让人不禁联想如果这一段在西西里的战斗能够拉长为多个章节该多好。实际上，编剧正是这么策划的，后面谈到删减部分的时候会详细说到。

第二章制作的同样极为出色，最令我惊奇的就是回家那一段。如果肯四处走走，你会跟报摊老板、餐厅里的曾经的老相好丽莎、老奶奶、因战争关店的老先生聊聊天。见识到杂货店里的冲突，忙碌的理发店，不让老公跟朋友出去的妻子，B17轰炸机飞过头顶，吵架时把东西丢出窗外的泼妇，跳窗后着陆不当的猫咪等。细节实在太过丰富，让人赞叹！家庭所欠的两千块债务是个沉重且急迫的担子，驱动了维托的行为，政府一周给的二十块津贴可远远不够。这部分还有段帮女人修车的剧情，完成后会获得成就，不容错过。乔的公寓同样细节满满，很多地方都可以互动。偷炸弹帮的车的时候，打倒第一个人后可以进门拿一把霰弹枪，果然偷车才是最赚钱的，一下子就赚三四百。

第三章里会跟德里克和斯蒂芬对话，如果带着已知父亲遇害原因的眼光看，就能感觉出来他们对维托父亲之死知情，而且有担心维托是来寻仇的，在提防着他。维托刚刚赚过快钱，是不可能老老实实搬箱子赚十块钱的，很干脆地选择收保护费来赚一百。另外，码头工人工会、港口以及走私业务都是芬奇家族的业务之一，德里克是个头目。偷油票的任务设计的也很棒，有段极为有意思的保安对话，那位保安预言了以后电子游戏的到来，哈哈。大部分人第一次玩都会在打开保险箱的时候触发警报，其实可以潜行去地下室提前关闭警报，还会获得成就。这样的话跟亨利的对话会有所不同，拿到的钱也更多，算一算这两天就已经赚够一千了。

第四章里终于开始接触黑手党高层了，派任务是帝国湾新晋克莱门特家族的头目（二把手）卢卡·古里诺，他们主要以前期常去的弗莱迪酒吧为据点，此外还拥有一家屠宰场。卢卡把任务交给手下亨利，亨利负责找有能力的外人完成。从这一章可以感觉到删减，衣服直接由乔搞定，只是等到天黑就去执行任务了。似乎本应有搞到衣服的前置任务，或者在等待的时间里安排些别的事情。这也导致本章非常短促。这一章同时开始涉及爱尔兰人的奥尼尔帮，夜间偷珠宝的时候碰到他们老大布莱恩·奥尼尔并交火。最终维托和乔逃走，布莱恩被抓入狱。标题墨菲定律已经在暗示，可能会出问题的事情就一定会出问题。亨利接连给的两个任务都遇到麻烦，事后想想可能是有原因的。

第五章的时间跟之前差了一个多星期，不再像之前是连续的了，但从跟卢卡的对话看来似乎又没隔多久。从本章开始接触到帮派老大阿尔贝托·克莱门特，并且有机会正式入会。入会费高达五千，那可是相当大的一笔钱，当然以后会知道这是该帮派为人不齿的地方。刺杀酒厂老板任务中遭遇的敌人也是奥尼尔帮的，送受伤的亨利去找的医生曾出现在开场动画中。任务完成后获得两千，足够帮家里还清债务了。本章一开始跟女人的接触是维托为数不多的此类时刻之一，帮助她还可获成就。

第六章里维托被判刑入狱，出现第一人称视角，整体是在模仿《肖申克的救赎》。本来债务还清，家庭事业都在上升期。然而，一切迅速坠落，审判时见的母亲已是最后一面。自己攒下的钱，没用给母亲用在看病上，也没能给姐姐用在婚礼上，全花在了葬礼上。第四章得罪了奥尼尔帮，在监狱里自然少不了布莱恩的特殊关照，幸好在文奇家族军师莱奥的帮助下，维托磨练近战技巧，最终击败布莱恩。只是他不识好歹非得用刀，最后被维托反杀。

第七章开始环境大变，借着战后经济复苏与崛起，彻底告别了之前紧张萧瑟的战争氛围，转而变成了春暖花开的黄金时代。出狱后别着急去找乔，可以先回家看看，会遇到姐姐的丈夫埃里克。不仅如此，再去拜访以前的杂货店、枪店和码头，全都有对话。这几年里亨利消失不见，乔搭上了法尔科内家族，维托虽然早前搭上了文奇家族，但还是随了乔。这次一上来就接触到法尔科内家族的头目艾迪，约在风月场所。可能是碍于分级制，这一段本可以安排更露骨的内容，但维托没有任何行为。虽然多次跟乔的女人眉来眼去，但始终没有什么，也许本该有条完整的爱情线。开车的时候如果停车，埃迪会下车吐，不然的话会吐在车里。新闻里说牡蛎湾有香烟丢失，这其实是在为下一章铺垫。另外，被埋尸的弗兰基原本是个重要人物，是个真正的FBI卧底，有专门的配音演员，但是他的故事仅仅退化成了一个额外网站。

第八章卖的烟，正是上一章里新闻说丢失的那批。这次遭遇的是个街头帮派，叫油头帮，破坏他们据点那段充分展示了游戏的破坏效果，算得上是标志性场面。因为卡车被烧，欠下埃迪两千，在工厂剿灭整个帮派后靠卖车赚了回来，合着辛苦一通就赚了点烟钱和分成（结果制作组还把分成的钱忘了）。

第九章开始接触法尔科内家族老大，他们以马耳他猎鹰酒吧为据点。克莱门特家族眼红法尔科内的毒品生意，绑架了会计等人想要逼问出毒品来源以便自己接管，两大帮派的战争由此挑起。这一章需要完全潜行，最终克莱门特家族二把手卢卡被绞成肉馅。完事后带着一身秽物直接去找埃迪或者换好衣服之后找埃迪，会触发不同的动画。至此，过了三分之二的流程，维托终于正式入会。虽然入的不是文奇家族，但莱奥也促成了此事。入会仪式上大佬云集，法尔科内是主持，文奇则是老大，不知有没有克莱门特家族的人。文奇像《教父》一样重申不能碰毒品生意，但法尔科内家族早就开始做毒品生意了，与其余两个家族的战争正在暗中酝酿。末尾的买车、买房、买西装、以及打人和杀人的快速剪辑加快了叙事的效率，但或许本该是个额外章节。

后续章节的解析放不下了，放到指南里了，感兴趣的请移步去指南区。

[h2]剧作分析[/h2]
本作和前作在故事层面有很多的重合之处，主体都是一个普通人被迫或者半被迫卷入黑手党组织，逐渐升至高位，但终究还是走向失控，最后招来祸患的故事。两位主角一个曾是出租车司机，一个曾是小混混/军人（解释了主角为何战斗力强悍），让人有很强的代入感，后来都进入黑手党并参与帮派战争。他们都做出过刺杀等不少伤天害理的事情，但内心仍保留着一部分的善，仍愿意承担风险救人（一个弗兰克，一个莱奥）。他们身边都有两个最好的朋友，最后却都面临着背叛抉择和生离死别。一番摸爬滚打，吃了不少苦头，可到头来还是一无所有。二代临近结局的时候，居然和初代的结局发生了奇妙的融合：第十四章里维托和乔去刺杀的污点证人正是前作里的主角汤米；前作结局里汤米被萨列里派一胖一瘦两名杀手刺杀，没想到正是二代的两位主角。初代重制版里过场动画做出更改，直接将两位杀手替换成了二代主角们的形象，成为又一款新作主角杀死前作主角的游戏。

不同之处显然也很多，前作汤米进入黑手党主要还是身不由己，本作的维托更多的是有意为之，他是真的向往有钱的日子。失落天堂市的帮派战争集中在萨列里和莫雷洛两大家族，汤米自始至终没有更换帮派。帝国湾涉及三大家族和一些其他大大小小的帮派，主角先后加入其中两个，还和第三个有着重要联系。前作的一大背景是美国的大萧条与禁酒令，后期主要坏事的是抢劫，也涉及毒品生意，但不是自己做的。本作的一大背景是美国梦与二战，后期坏事的则是毒品交易以及挑起帮派大战。前作在帮派战争和兄弟情之外，很重要的一部分就是汤米自己的爱情，对其原本家庭完全没有涉及。本作里的维托则自始至终基本没碰过女人（除了帮乔招来的女郎出头），也没有爱情产生，转而深入展示其原生家庭。

家庭在开场用于渲染成长背景，归乡后一方面展示亲情温暖，另一方面又渲染家庭经济上的脆弱。这为维托放弃一天十美元的苦工，转而作奸犯科赚大钱提供驱动力。直到后期，原生家庭仍然是主角所作所为的强烈动机。维托出人头地后，与姐姐无可避免的疏远，明明有了力量，却又无法施展带来深深无力感。父亲去世的原因揭晓后，主角幡然醒悟，带领码头工人反抗，不顾后果地完成复仇。维托的人生夹杂着更多的大起大落，稍有起色就被抓，一判就是十年。出狱后，好不容易正式入会过上了梦想中的日子，但转眼就被烧得一无所有，又得重新开始。后期似乎又有了翻盘的机会，但失去的却更多。

主角维托帅气逼人，似初是照着年轻时的马龙·白兰度捏的脸，但整个故事对维托刻画的并不深。他太过于受到外部环境的主宰，除了主动救莱奥和入会自白那段，很少显露自身性格，没有内在的魅力。简单说来就是太过工具人。配角乔和亨利的刻画倒还更胜一筹，至今大家仍在讨论亨利到底是不是叛徒，以及乔究竟死没死。乔在形象上逊于维托不少，但他花天酒地，敢爱敢恨，时而自信满满，志在必得；时而为了兄弟两肋插刀，义气满满；时而为了在乎的人懊悔不已，情绪失控；时而愤怒冲天，化身战神……角色不需完美，让玩家共情就能让人在乎。亨利的死亡太过突然和惨烈，让玩家措手不及，受到了强烈的情感冲击。其身边还环绕着一团迷雾，支持和不支持他是叛徒的证据同时存在，又没有哪一个足够直接，能给出定论。

说他是FBI的人会说中国帮和莱奥做了明确说明，仔细回想，几乎每一个涉及到亨利的事都没有好结果，比如因偷汽油票入狱；他的口音有问题，阶层不高但知道的太多；突然出现令人生疑，看着就像是被抓后跟警方做交易了；毒品生意主要是他的点子，并且一下子认出了假警察……另一方认为维托入狱一事另有告密者，DLC乔的冒险专门讲了。离职的编剧丹尼尔·瓦夫拉（Daniel Vávra）说亨利并不是叛徒，一切都是被法尔科内陷害的，他并没有理由那么做。有一章的电台中播放了一首关于一个名为亨利的人被陷害的歌。第七章里被埋的那个人是真正的卧底，但游戏发售前就介绍他的网站中直接提到亨利是黑手党，显然他并不是叛徒……双方都有证据，又都不那么直接。我个人还是更偏向于亨利是FBI的人这一说法，因为其证据主要在游戏内，反方证据主要在游戏之外。游戏大量的删减也是造成这一问题的重要原因。

[h2]令人遗憾的删减[/h2]
绝大多数游戏都会有删减：起初的规划总是宏伟的，但真做起来就会体会到实现的难度。然而，有些游戏的删减话题热度异常得高，时至今日仍不断被人提起，最具代表性的就是《黑手党2》、《生化奇兵3》和《辐射4》。为何会这么高呢？主要是其中的删减太过明显，到了玩家无法忽视的地步。《黑手党2》连预告中出现的内容都能被移除，封面上的第四个人是谁都不知道，曾经的许诺也没有实现。发售版本中到处是删减的痕迹，玩家一查就能发现。我汇总各方预告、消息、解包拿到的证据，分类说一下主要的几个方面。

一、城市公共交通系统，包括火车、地铁、巴士和出租车。我们在游戏中可见运行中的火车，但是永远无法登上，通往那里的门被堵住了。地铁站虽在DLC中展示了，但仍旧无法搭乘。巴士原本可以乘坐，出租车也是可以招呼的。结果，几乎整个公共交通系统被全部删除，第二章从酒吧回家需要搭乘出租车，但镜头一闪而过，你已经到目的地了，第七章也仅仅停留在过场动画里。这些删减使得玩家的出行仅剩开车一个方式，也难怪玩家抱怨开车太多。

二、汽车驾驶相关。车内视角，不是只看到引擎盖的那个，而是能看到仪表盘和方向盘的真正车内视角。后备箱原本可自由使用，用于存放物品和武器，但删到仅出现在过场中，要知道路人都是可以使用的。有些车辆也被删除，比如摩托车、军车（不是DLC里的那辆）和叉车。带有对话的查理的汽修店也被删除。自由驾驶模式被删除，这也使得本作成为系列里唯一没有自由驾驶模式的。

三、警察相关。原本可以购买枪支许可证，被警察见到当众持枪后可以出示，之后他就不管了。枪支许可证还对应有个教学事件，逼退小混混后，被警察发现。闯红灯原本会触发警察的警报，实际只有同伴的吐槽，不过删了更方便。

四、世界互动。车展中心和房产中心被删除，仅在过场中一闪而过，车展中心变成了外部的汽车百科。实际上可以在店中购买汽车，也可以购买多套价格不同的房产。从破旧公寓到豪华别墅再到摩天大楼一应俱全，开场动画中家人来到帝国湾后最先住的那个破房子也在地图中。在住所中可以洗澡等，还能买报纸，钓鱼等。更多商店，如唱片店、披萨店、理发店、赛犬玩法也被删除。声望系统也没了，其数值会影响周围人对你的态度，还会影响购物价格和罚款数目。

五、故事类。原本故事中有多处关键选择节点，比如14章中放高利贷的布鲁诺坦言自己曾借贷给维托的父亲，也是导致其被杀的原因之一。原本可以是杀死布鲁诺的，这一类的选择在终章迎来不同走向，引向四种不同的结局，这一点被高级制作人Denby Grace所证实。实际时间线比游戏结束的那个时间点还要靠后，甚至还会讲1957年的事情。还有传言说意大利西西里岛的战役不止开场时候的那一段任务，而是一个完整的战役。此外，史蒂夫让维托烧毁汽车的任务挪到DLC，一名用于联络的角色被删除，还有一些动画被删除，对应着哪些章节和任务，我们就不得而知了。

除此之外，还有通关后本应该增加一种极限难度，大量室内场景的半成品。十几种武器被删除，包括大量近战武器，包括棒球棍、小刀、指虎、警棍、扳手等，还有木柄手榴弹、火箭筒等……

[h2]为何如此？[/h2]
这些内容可不是仅仅停留在开发组的大脑或者纸面上，而是基本都已经做完了。有些玩家稍作修改就能调出莱，再给制作组一点时间，相信他们肯定能将其放入到游戏之中。那么，到底是为什么呢？直接原因就是Bug来不及调试，而且为了赶发售时间，需要先把主线做完，已经没有时间花在上面那些内容上了，干脆删掉或隐藏。

不论如何，《黑手党2》的开发过程中必定发生了重大的问题，我将其归纳为外部原因和内部原因。外部原因主要来自于世代更替和引擎变动。制作组本来打算采用系列初代的LS3D引擎，瞄准XBOX和PS2平台。那时正好碰上新旧世代主机交替，XBOX 360和PS3接连发布。为了适应新主机，他们改用曾被用于制作GTA3和马克思佩恩2的Renderware引擎，大量工作重新来了一遍。然而，该引擎又被EA买断，制作组的使用权被取消。最终制作组被迫在LS3D引擎的基础上重新制作Illusion引擎，这来回的折腾浪费了不少时间和资源。

内部原因则来自高层干预。系列初代成功后，引得Take-Two在2008年对Illusion Softworks进行收购，此后改名为2K Czech。小公司原本的体系架构必须适应大型母公司的要求，高层的集体决策取代原本的制作人说了算，独立性被大大压缩。设计师兼首席编剧丹尼尔·瓦夫拉（Daniel Vávra）曾负责编写《黑手党2》的剧本，他所设计的很多任务和结局都被删减了。他本人在游戏发售1年前离职，原工作室的几位员工也在不久后离职。总之，游戏开发遭到了高层的巨大干预，而且给予资金和时间也不足。

曾有传言说《黑手党2》原本应该有130-150章，但我并不相信。要是他们真的做出100多章，那么《黑手党2》要么成为史上最伟大的游戏，要么就成为史上最拖沓的游戏，而我偏向于后者。个人认为章节翻倍，即二十多章（有人说22章）原本是他们的计划，也就是说游戏砍掉了近一半的章节。在时间和资金都不足的情况下，迫于高层的压力，制作组挑出了游戏最精华的章节以及完成度最高的一个官方结局组成了主线。能拼出这个动人故事就很不容易了，这也间接说明了本作原本的潜力有多高，如果按照开发组的设想，完成原本计划的开放世界玩法，或许能成为GTA级别的超级大作也不一定。

[h2]惊喜的收集品，糟糕的DLC[/h2]
本作中有《花花公子》和通缉令两种收集品，我对159张通缉令的兴趣不大，但杂志模特页收集实在让人无法自拔。哪怕到现在我仍然保留着主线中收集的50张和DLC中的19张原版高清图片。不得不说，大胸实在太好看了。其中直接露骨的成人内容令当时的我血脉贲张，身材惹火的女郎可比很多同期游戏中遮遮掩掩的演出要好看得多。

《吉米的背叛》和《吉米的复仇》两个DLC烂到我不想再提，仅有开场和结局配有一段动画，中间则是令人恼火的任务。仅仅配一张图片就丢给你一个任务，到处是破坏沉浸感的网游式设计，无聊透顶。偏偏有些任务还特别难，让我尝试了十几次。乔的冒险是所有DLC最好的一个，有四个剧情任务，但这个好只是相对的。该DLC原本是夹在维托入狱那段时间的，开场与维托被捕衔接。乔作为第二个可控角色去探寻好友入狱的原因，其中的潜行和冰上追逐那段十分精彩。此外还应该多讲讲和马蒂的故事，才能更好解释乔伤心欲绝的原因。然而，急转直下，不再有任何动画，又变成无聊透顶的图片任务。纯纯浪费了里面制作得那么好的新场景，整体看来把本作的DLC评为史上最差DLC也并不为过！ | Отличная игра с шикарной атмосферой и сюжетом. Приятная даже для 2025 года графика. Из минусов это в первую очередь мертвый город без активностей и унылые DLC. А так твердые 8/10, нестареющая классика. | [h1]以美國黑手黨為主題的簡化版 GTA[/h1]
[i]看四代快要出了，特地回來補個評價最好的二代。[/i]

[h3]⚠️ [b]重要事情說在前頭[/b][/h3]
[b]因為遊戲太老，只能存取到 2GB 的系統記憶體，導致現在新電腦玩的時候有機會運行一段時間就閃退。解決方法是去 Google 搜尋並下載一個叫「4GB Patch」的小程式，只要用這個程式運行一次遊戲的執行檔（mafia2 exe）就可以修復問題。（執行檔位置在 Steam\steamapps\common\Mafia II\pc 內）[/b]

[h3]🌏 [b]故事大鋼[/b][/h3]
主角 Vito Scaletta 在七歲的時候就跟隨著家人從義大利西西里移民到美國帝國灣追尋「美國夢」，但惡劣的居住環境和拮据的生活在 Vito 眼裡卻只是一場惡夢。在環境所迫之下，長大後的 Vito 決定與死黨 — Joe 過上犯罪生活，不過 Vito 卻在其中一次偷竊期間失手被捕，最終還得以參軍代替牢役。

回國後的 Vito 與 Joe 開始在黑手黨 Clementi 家族底下幹活，及後他更在獄中認識了自己的「犯罪教父」 Leo。Leo 十分欣賞 Vito 的能力與膽識，他甚至推薦 Vito 成為 Falcone 家族的正式成員，而正當 Vito 平步青雲的時候，他也逐漸地捲進 Clementi、Falcone 與 Vinci 三大黑手黨家族的暗鬥之中，最後 Vito 更成為了整起風暴的中心並且付出了他最不願意看到的代價……
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3409222288
[h3]🔸 [b]經典版還是決定版？[/b][/h3]
從畫質角度來說，決定版修改了一些貼圖和光線品質，但體感分別最大的還是顏色飽和度的增加，不過這比較看個人喜好，筆者就傾向經典版的色調，Youtube 上有很多比較影片，想知道詳細分別的話可以去看看。至於 Bug 方面，其他玩家反映決定版還是一樣有各種問題，但文首提到的 2GB 閃退 Bug 應該是修好了。另外決定版是有中文語言的，所以筆者覺得，如果你是英文苦手，那就玩決定版；如果英文應付得來，就玩經典版吧。
[hr][/hr]
[h3]👍 [b]遊戲優點[/b][/h3]
[list]
[*]豐富的配角群設計。相比起主角，配角群的人設其實來得更加突出。從四肢發達頭腦簡單的死黨 Joe，到軍師 Leo、高利貸 Bruno、黑醫 El Greco，甚至小弟 Marty 等都令人更感興趣。

[*]詳細的車輛與相關系統。Mafia 系列一直都相對花心思在車輛相關的系統上，二代本體＋DLC 總共有 46 種車輛，除了大型車輛之外，其他的駕駛手感都不錯，玩家把車開到維修站還可以升級引擎、改車牌或改塗裝等，另外還有一些細節設計，例如按喇叭時前方車輛會靠邊迴避、加油站真的可以加油等（但沒甚麼卵用就是了）。

[*]PLAYBOY 雜誌收集。遊戲的其中一項可收集內容就是 PLAYBOY，而它們都是以前 50 和 60 年代真實的 PLAYBOY 封面，就算在 GTA 裡也沒做到這種尺度，不過之後四代的背景會回到義大利，這種內容高機率不會再有了。
[/list]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3413706711
[h3]👎 [b]遊戲缺點[/b][/h3]
[list]
[*]花瓶般的開放式世界。之前玩一代決定版的時候就發現過同樣問題了，這遊戲（系列）的開放式世界基本上就只是單純的佈景板，頂多也就是為了交通功能而服務，完全稱不上是一個有「生命力」的世界。筆者覺得最可惜的地方是沒有世界相關的支線任務，所以除非是想收集那些無聊的通緝海報，否則根本就沒有任何誘因去探索地圖的其他位置。

[*]強制性主線任務。上面提到遊戲並沒有支線任務，而主線任務更是無縫扣在玩家身上的，這讓玩家無時無刻都是在前往任務的過程當中，就像被主線推著走一樣，可能製作組也知道世界裡沒甚麼東西好自由探索的，所以趕緊迫玩家解主線好了。

[*]故事缺乏追看性。老實說二代的故事雖然不算差，但卻沒有想要追看的那個衝動，原因可能是因為故事以「案件式」的章節來進行，很多故事情節都是突然展開，整個劇情鋪排並沒有到很仔細，而這也相對難帶動玩家的情緒。

[*]兒戲的通緝系統。這遊戲有像 GTA 般的通緝系統，但強度完全不能比，因為無論幾星也好，都只會出現一般的警察，而且數量只有零星幾位，玩家只要把視線內的警察解決掉，通緝很快就會解除，整個系統就是非常的雞肋。

[*]各種 Bug。除了一開始說明的閃退問題之外，還有各種奇怪 Bug，例如第四章被通緝時會進入長時間的藍畫面慢動作，要跑一段長距離才能回復，還有在第十章過場動畫中的 Joe 模型會消失等。
[/list]
https://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=3409003114
二代雖然作為系列中評價最好的一作，但無論是世界體驗、故事深度或系統設計上都經不起時間的考驗，而整體的遊玩體驗也只算是一個全方位簡化的 GTA。希望即將推出的新作《四海兄弟：故鄉》除了畫質提升之餘，也能夠創造出一些 IP 獨有的新優勢，而不用再活在 GTA 的影子之下。
